review_title: A good place to serve the vulnerable
job_title: Public Health Professional in Addis Ababa
pros:
satisfying job with direct access to beneficiaries
Modest benefits

job_title: Finance and Administrative Manager in Addis Ababa
pros: The team in Ethiopia Country Office are very well committed to their work. The doctors, pharmacists, lab technicians and others work with passion. Management is good and caring
cons: Benefit package is very low. No education allowance and medical insurance doesn't cover dependents. Financial management is complicated with the involvement of an external accounting firm. Head quarter lack trust in the country office staffs in management of finance.
